saas.title: SaaS solutions: subscription payment?
saas.content:
SaaS architecture allows software solutions to be used online, everywhere and at any time, from a browser.

How does it work?

The software is relocated and accessible remotely via network, through a subscription with the publisher/host, on any browser.
- Fully digitalized solution
- Maintenance and updates provided by the service provider
- Data access: Cloud computing
- Turnkey solution
- Data protection depends on the provider
- Relocated data

on_premise.title: On-premise solutions: license purchase
on_premise.content:
On-premise solutions are software whose architecture is physically present within a company.

How does it work?

- The software is installed on the company's servers, which must first purchase a license from the publisher to use the software in question.
- Remote access possible
- Maintenance and updates depend on internal IT department
- Data access: even without internet
- Internal data security
- On-site hosted data

value_proposition.title: M-IoT
value_proposition.subtitle: How to valorize and enrich your data flows?
value_proposition.description:
An IoT (Internet of Things) platform plays a central role by bringing together data and communications from connected objects. Its primary objective: simplify the collection, storage and processing of indicators derived from data, to better manage the connected environment and even automate its operations.

Are you considering exploiting your data through an IoT platform? Take a few moments to explore the operating mode characterizing this type of ecosystem.

support.description: As a publisher, connectivity is at the heart of our business, in our offers as well as in the platforms we design. In order to provide a solution and service that is both global and unique, we integrate the objects designed by our manufacturing partners directly into our intelligent platforms.
